Lack suitability trial : Negative bone marrow aspirate ( smear ) ; Any history prior antileishmania therapy ; Any condition compromise ability comply study procedure ; Concomitant serious infection visceral leishmaniasis ( would include evidence condition associate splenomegaly schistosomiasis malaria ) .
